description: React component 'RecipeGrid' that renders a list of recipes in a responsive grid layout. It displays a message if no recipes are provided and maps over the recipes array to render individual 'RecipeCard' components.

methods.name: RecipeGrid({ recipes = [] })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a grid of recipes, accepting a 'recipes' prop with default empty array. Displays 'No recipes found.' if the array is empty.
